title: [Saewehna Jungle, Waterfall]
description: Dense shadows complicate travel along the path edging a rocky plateau.  Moonlight reflects upon the mist cascading down from the top of the falls, casting prismatic glimmers in a striking contrast to the oppressive darkness of the jungle at night.  Slick with condensation, the outcropping levels out to accommodate exploration, while the path provides a way to the next level of the waterfall.

Ascending terrain complicates travel along the dense path edging a rocky plateau.  Mist cascading down from the top of the falls resembles miniature crystals sparkling with the reflection of the lush hues of the jungle.  Slick and gleaming with condensation, the surface of the outcropping levels out to accommodate exploration, while the path provides a way to the next level of the waterfall.
room.location: the environs of the Saewehna Lagoon
